attributes.action: require all assylum seekers to sign a contract when registering as an assylum seeker  that they will refrain from illegal or criminal activities.  This contract should state that if they do their application will be non and void and they will be deported regardless of the situation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When someone arrives seeking assylum then they should be asked to sign a contract giving the undertaking that they will not engage in any illegal or criminal activity. If they do illegal or criminal activity then their application will be nul and void and they will be deported regardless of the consequences.
